thread.title_full: Revenge of the Quarterback Nerd - WSJ

author: Matthew Futterman
title: Revenge of the Quarterback Nerd - WSJ
text:
NFL Revenge of the Quarterback Nerd Low-key, studious and almost bland, Atlanta’s Matt Ryan has turned the knock against him into his calling card. By Google+ Feb. 1, 2017 6:07 p.m. ET 
HOUSTON—The world knows nearly every inch of New England Patriots quarterback Tom Brady’s life: the supermodel wife, insanely strict diet, fashion show cameos and glamor vacations. The world knows much less about Atlanta Falcons quarterback Matt Ryan, and what it’s learning about him in the Super Bowl spotlight may come as a surprise. 
In an age of escalating quarterback flash, Ryan anchors the bland end of the spectrum. He’s... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Most Popular Videos
